greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n, d=2 mod 3} d.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: A078181(n) + a(n) + 3*A000203(n/3) = A000203(n), where A000203 is defined as zero for non-integer arguments. - _R. J. Mathar_, May 11 2016
mathematica: a[n_] := Plus @@ Select[Divisors[n], Mod[#, 3] == 2 &]; Array[a, 100] (* _Giovanni Resta_, May 11 2016 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, d*((d%3) == 2)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 11 2016
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 21 2002
